title: TU 147: Body-Focused Therapy with Dr. Robert Coffman
description: Bioenergetic therapist Dr. Robert Coffman joins co-host Dr. Ann Kelley for a conversation on body-focused therapy. Learn the about the interplay of your nervous system and how that relates to attachment and trauma.
itunes:subtitle: Integrating the body to heal the mind, attachment and neuroscience in action
itunes:summary:
What's the difference between the brain the mind and the body?
Bioenergetic therapist Dr. Robert Coffman joins co-host Dr. Ann Kelley for a conversation on body-focused therapy. Learn the interplay of our nervous system and how it relates to attachment and trauma. This is one of several episodes on somatically oriented therapies - see show notes www.therapistuncensored.com/episodes
itunes:author: Ann Kelley PhD
itunes:title: Body-Focused Therapy with Dr. Robert Coffman
